body_html:
Hi All
I have also been trying to have a healthy docker based developer environment. I have had some success. I have a Ubuntu 14 box with TitanX GPU. Here are some docker files and a runner script which might help.

Tensorflow Dockerfile: https://github.com/abhishekpatnia/Docker/blob/master/docker_images/Dockerfile.tensorflow

Also I wanted IDE support so I created a Docker image for Pycharm which can be triggered from inside a container. For example you can use the tensorflow image as base for this dockerfile.
https://github.com/abhishekpatnia/Docker/blob/master/docker_images/Dockerfile.pycharmDE

Also have a helper script to run docker containers. This will allow you to have multiple sessions with the same container. It sets up proper ports and CUDA specific things.
https://github.com/abhishekpatnia/Docker/blob/master/bin/dockersh
